title: Missed Lottery? Play OWNING make 633% rate of return - 4/3/2
posting_body: Here let me sell you a ticket that guarantees much better odds and there is no way to lose - Its called OWNING
Median price of a home now is $380,000, and homes go up by 10% a year, which means they double in value every 7.2 years
Lets say you invested $500/month extra to OWN, that's $6000 a year, but at the end of the year you get back 10% or $38,000, which is 633%
There is no risk, you live there, you can enhance those odds by adding value to the house, and live the good life, while you are playing
Interested call or txt 8 17 770 62 5six, I'll ask you 3 Qs, answer all yours, come see the house, like it, move in, and pay it off, its really that simple
Its easy, there is no bank involved, no credit or bad credit is ok, as long as you make good money, and can sustain a payment, you can OWN
In order to OWN, you must be able to sustain a payment of AT LEAST $2000/month, the actual payment may vary by the house
keywords: rent to own lease to own bad credit no papers ssn passport fsbo buy direct from seller Owner Finance Dueno a Dueno cash deal local
